cd: Signet. You gain 82..172 Health. <c=@SkillDull>You have -40 armor while using this skill.</c>
d: Signet. You gain 82..172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

cd: Signet. Resurrects target party member (100% Health, 25% Energy). <c=@SkillDull>This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.</c>
d: Signet. Resurrect target party member. That party member is returned to life with 100% Health and 25% Energy. This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

cd: Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.
d: Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

cd: Touch Skill. BAMPH!
d: Touch Skill. BAMPH!
Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for 1..12 seconds and that skill is interrupted.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Reduces earth damage you take by 26..50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take earth damage.
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, whenever you take earth damage, the damage is reduced by 26..50% and you gain 2 Energy.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Reduces fire damage you take by 26..50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take fire damage.
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, whenever you take fire damage, the damage is reduced by 26..50% and you gain 2 Energy.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Reduces cold damage you take by 26..50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take cold damage.
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, whenever you take cold damage, the damage is reduced by 26..50% and you gain 2 Energy.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Reduces lightning damage you take by 26..50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take lightning damage.
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, whenever you take lightning damage, the damage is reduced by 26..50% and you gain 2 Energy.

cd: Stance. (5..80 seconds.) The next hex against you fails and the caster takes 10..46 damage.
d: Stance. For 5..80 seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex, that hex fails and the caster takes 10..46 damage.

cd: Stance. (1..5 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. <c=@SkillDull>Block cost: you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.</c>
d: Stance. For 1..5 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block an attack this way, you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.

cd: Elite Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Your Fast Casting attribute increases by 50%. <c=@SkillDull>Cast cost: lose 3 Energy or Mantra of Celerity ends.</c>
d: Elite Stance. For 30..90 seconds, your Fast Casting attribute increases by 50%. Whenever you cast a spell, you lose 3 Energy or Mantra of Celerity ends.

cd: Elite Stance. (5..20 seconds.) Your spells recharge 33% faster.
d: Elite Stance. For 5..20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

cd: Stance. (5..25 seconds.) Illusion hexes you cast last 10..40% longer.
d: Stance. For 5..25 seconds, any Illusion Magic hex you cast lasts 10..40% longer.

cd: Stance. (5..25 seconds.) Signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10..40% faster.
d: Stance. For 5..25 seconds, signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10..40% faster.

cd: Stance. (1..38 seconds.) The next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.
d: Stance. For 1..38 seconds, the next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. <c=@SkillDull>Prevention cost: lose 10..4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.</c>
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10..4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

cd: Stance. (10..40 seconds.) You have +3 armor for each signet. You gain 5..60 Health each time you use a signet.
d: Stance. For 10..40 seconds, you have +3 armor for each signet you have equipped. Whenever you use a signet, you gain 5..60 Health.

cd: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8..20 seconds). These foes take 5..20 damage each time they gain or lose a condition.
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, target and adjacent foes take 5..20 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.

cd: Hex Spell. NULL
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, target foe's attacks may damage any character in range, including the target.

cd: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain 3..15 Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).
d: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain 3..15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.

cd: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain 4..10 Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).
d: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4..10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

cd: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals 30..120 damage.
d: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes 30..120 damage.

cd: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: causes 3..17 Energy loss.
d: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses 3..17 Energy.

cd: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: you gain 1..31 Energy.
d: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain 1..31 Energy.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..15 seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal 1..15 less damage, and that foe takes 10..55 damage with each attack.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10..55 damage and deals 1..15 less damage.

cd: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15..75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.
d: Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex is removed, that foe and all adjacent foes take 15..75 damage.

cd: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 35..140 damage whenever it casts a spell.
d: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35..140 damage.

cd: Touch Skill. (2..6 seconds.) Disables skills. <c=@SkillDull>Your skills are disabled (5 seconds).</c>
d: Touch Skill. For 2..6 seconds, all of touched target foe's skills are disabled, and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes +10..56 seconds to recharge.
d: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10..56 seconds to recharge.

cd: Hex Spell. (2..16 seconds.) Causes -5 Health degeneration.
d: Hex Spell. For 2..16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

cd: Enchantment Spell. Lose 50..240 Health. End effect: you gain 50..240 Health. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. You lose 50..240 Health. Illusion of Weakness ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum. When Illusion of Weakness ends, you gain 50..240 Health.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 8..40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill. <c=@SkillDull>Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8..40 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (4..10 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 4..10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.

cd: Hex Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds target foe cannot use signets.

cd: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5..15 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain 1..7 energy.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain 1..7 energy.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Initial effect: removes Crippled condition. <c=@SkillDull>End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..11 seconds you are no longer Crippled, and you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (8..56 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area whenever you cast a spell.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 8..56 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area.

cd: Elite Spell. Causes 1..10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1..10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

cd: Spell. Causes 3 Energy loss. You gain 20..65 Health for each point of Energy lost.
d: Spell. Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20..65 for each point of Energy lost.

cd: Hex Spell. <c=@SkillDull>You lose all Energy.</c> Target foe has -1..3 Energy degeneration and you have +1..3 Energy regeneration (5..10 seconds).
d: Hex Spell. You lose all Energy. For 5..10 seconds, target foe suffers -1..3 Energy degeneration, and you experience +1..3 Energy regeneration.

cd: Spell. Causes 1..10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.
d: Spell. Target foe loses 1..10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

cd: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Also hexes adjacent foes. Interrupts next attack. Interruption effect: deals 10..92 damage.
d: Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, target and adjacent foes are hexed with Clumsiness. The next time each foe attacks, the attack is interrupted and that foe suffers 10..92 damage.

cd: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -1..4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5..20 seconds).
d: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -1..4 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain 10..18 Energy.
d: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Ethereal Burden ends, you gain 10..18 Energy.

cd: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5..14 Energy. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless this foe's spell targets one of your allies.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 5..14 Energy from that foe.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Also hexes foes adjacent to target. Deals 30..135 damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless hexed foe attacks.</c>
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time the target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take 30..135 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe has 25% chance to miss. You gain 1..3 Energy whenever this foe misses.
d: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks. You gain 1..3 Energy whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

Hex Spell. For 5..40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy and takes 5..25 damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15..100 damage.

cd: Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: causes 20..100 damage to target and adjacent foes. <c=@SkillDull>No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.</c>
d: Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take 20..100 damage. If that foe successfully uses a skill, Wastrel's Worry ends prematurely and does no damage.

cd: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5..14 Energy. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally, the spell fails and you steal up to 5..14 Energy from that foe.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (1..10 seconds). Interrupts all other nearby foes whenever a hexed foe successfully activates a skill.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 1..10 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill, all other nearby foes are interrupted.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Causes -1..8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target foe suffers -1..8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 50% slower and has -1..8 Health degeneration.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -1..8 Health degeneration.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (10..25 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires. Inflicts Dazed on target foe (1..3 seconds) if that foe has two or more conditions.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 10..25 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions, that foe is Dazed for 1..3 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8..20 seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot gain adrenaline.

cd: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take 15..75 damage.
d: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer 15..75 damage.

cd: Elite Signet. (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. <c=@SkillDull>You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).</c>
d: Elite Signet. You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.

cd: Signet. Also affects foes near your target. Causes 3..8 Energy loss and inflicts Weakness (1..12 seconds).
d: Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes lose 3..8 Energy and suffer from Weakness for 1..12 seconds.

cd: Signet. (3..15 seconds.) The next spell you cast uses Illusion Magic instead of its normal attribute.
d: Signet. For 3..15 seconds, the next spell you cast uses Illusion Magic as its attribute.

cd: Signet. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: you gain 3..15 Energy if the action was a spell.
d: Signet. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain 3..15 Energy.

cd: Signet. Disables elite skill (1..16 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).</c>
d: Signet. Target foe's elite skill is disabled for 1..16 seconds. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

cd: Elite Signet. (20 seconds.) Your next 0..6 signets interrupt and deal 15..60 damage to other foes adjacent to your target. Initial Effect: recharges all of your other signets.
d: Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0..6 times you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15..60 damage and are interrupted.

cd: Spell. (20 seconds.) This skill is replaced with the last skill used by this ally. <c=@SkillDull>Ends after one use.</c>
d: Spell. Learn the last skill used by target ally. For 20 seconds, Mimic is replaced by the skill you learned. You may use the skill once.

cd: Spell. This skill becomes target ally's elite skill (20 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target. No effect if target's elite skill is a form.</c>
d: Spell. For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.

cd: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30..120 damage to foes near this ally.
d: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take 30..120 damage.

cd: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: you gain 8..17 Energy and 40..120 Health.
d: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8..17 Energy and 40..120 Health.

cd: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals 14..100 damage.
d: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes 14..100 damage.

cd: Spell. (10 seconds.) You disappear.
d: Spell. You disappear for 10 seconds.

cd: Signet. Removes the most recent nature ritual. <c=@SkillDull>Your skills are disabled (60..30 seconds).
d: Signet. Remove the most recent nature ritual. All of your skills are disabled for 60..30 seconds.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against elemental damage. <c=@SkillDull>You have -24..12 armor against physical damage.</c>
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against elemental damage, but you lose 24..12 armor against physical damage.

cd: Stance. (30..90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage. <c=@SkillDull>You have -24..12 armor against elemental damage.</c>
d: Stance. For 30..90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against physical damage, but you lose 24..12 armor against elemental damage.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Echo becomes the next skill you use (30 seconds).
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Arcane Echo becomes the next spell you use (20 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>This enchantment ends if you use any skill that is not a spell.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. If you cast a spell in the next 20 seconds, Arcane Echo is replaced with that spell for 20 seconds. Arcane Echo ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

cd: Hex Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower.
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

cd: Spell. Deals 5..25 damage and causes 0..2 Energy loss each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.
d: Spell. Create a Chaos Storm at target foe's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Each second, foes adjacent to this location take 5..25 damage and lose 0..2 Energy.

cd: Spell. Conditions on target foe transfer to adjacent foes.
d: Spell. Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

cd: Elite Spell. Causes 2..9 Energy loss. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 2..9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

cd: Spell. Causes 4..7 Energy loss. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
d: Spell. Target foe loses 4..7 Energy. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

cd: Spell. (5..35 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.
d: Spell. For 5..35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) End effect: you gain 10..25 Energy.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain 10..25 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.

cd: Spell. Creates a level 1..17 bone horror. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1..17 bone horror.

cd: Spell. Creates a level 1..17 bone fiend that can attack at range. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1..17 bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.

cd: Spell. Creates two level 0..12 bone minions. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level 0..12 bone minions.

cd: Elite Spell. You gain Health equal to half the difference between you and target, and this foe loses an equal amount. <c=@SkillDull>If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference and that foe gains an equal amount.</c>
d: Elite Spell. If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.

cd: Spell. Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless, you become its master. <c=@SkillDull>50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</c>
d: Spell. If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master, you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: Enchantment Spell. (120..300 seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. <c=@SkillDull>End effect: your undead servants become masterless. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after 120..300 seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: Spell. Deals 5..50 cold damage. Deals 5..50 more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.
d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5..50 cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional 5..50 shadow damage.

cd: Spell. (5..10 seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. <c=@SkillDull>Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.</c>
d: Spell. For 5..10 seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions, Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.

cd: Elite Well Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1..6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Elite Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For 8..20 seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain +1..6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.

cd: Well Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1..6 Health regeneration. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For 8..20 seconds, allies in that area receive +1..6 Health regeneration.

cd: Well Spell. (10..30 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1..6 Health degeneration. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For 10..30 seconds, foes in that area suffer -1..6 Health degeneration.

cd: Well Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</c>
d: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of the Profane at its location. For 8..20 seconds, foes in that area are stripped of all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: Spell. Explodes a corpse, dealing 24..120 damage to foes near it. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals 24..120 damage to nearby foes.

cd: Spell. You gain 50..280 Health. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to gain 50..280 Health.

cd: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5..20 seconds). Affects all nearby foes. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain 25..100 Health and 5..20 Energy. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Spell. Exploit a random target. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain 25..100 Health and 5..20 Energy.

cd: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for 30..120 Health.
d: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for 30..120 when Parasitic Bond ends.

cd: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15..30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.
d: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15..30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

cd: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe takes 1..15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.
d: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 1..15 more damage when hit by physical damage.

cd: Spell. Deals 12..48 damage. Steal up to 12..48 Health if this foe was above 50% Health.
d: Spell. Target foe takes 12..48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12..48 Health.

cd: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes 1..46 damage whenever it fails to hit.
d: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes 1..46 damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 26..100 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26..100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

cd: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals 30..90 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.
d: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30..90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

cd: Spell. Inflicts Diseased condition (10..25 seconds).
d: Spell. Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for 10..25 seconds, slowly losing Health.

cd: Elite Spell. Inflicts Disease, Poison, and Weakness conditions (3..15 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless this foe already had a condition.</c>
d: Elite Spell. If target foe was already suffering from a condition, that foe suffers from Disease, Poison, and Weakness for 3..15 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (6..30 seconds). These foes have -0..3 Health degeneration.
d: Hex Spell. For 6..30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0..3 Health degeneration.

cd: Hex Spell. (12..24 seconds.) Target foe has -1..3 Health degeneration. You have +1..3 Health regeneration.
d: Hex Spell. For 12..24 seconds, target foe suffers -1..3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1..3 Health regeneration.

cd: Spell. Steals 10..65 Health from 1..4 foes in the area around you.
d: Spell. Steal up to 10..65 Health from up to 1..4 foes in the area.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (20..44 seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. <c=@SkillDull>Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 20..44 seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses, but whenever you sacrifice Health, you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.

cd: Spell. Deals 6..60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4..20 more damage for each enchantment on them.
d: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6..60 shadow damage and 4..20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20..44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3..15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20..44 seconds, target ally is immune to disease, and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for 3..15 seconds.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level 1..17 bone horror, plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic (5..45 seconds).
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level 1..17 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For 5..45 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You have +3..6 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40..190.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain +3..6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40..190 Health.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 5..50 damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. <c=@SkillDull>Damage cost: you lose 5..20 Health.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target ally sacrifices Health, Dark Aura deals 5..50 shadow damage to adjacent foes, and you lose 5..20 Health.

cd: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (10..30 seconds).
d: Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for 10..30 seconds.

cd: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (5..20 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.
d: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) +3..6 Energy regeneration. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target other ally gains +3..6 Energy regeneration.

cd: Spell. Heals your undead servants for 30..116. <c=@SkillDull>Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.</c>
d: Spell. All of your undead allies are healed for 30..116 Health. You sacrifice an additional 2% maximum Health per minion healed in this way.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Deals 5..35 damage to target and adjacent foes whenever this foe attacks or uses a skill.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or uses a skill, Spiteful Spirit deals 5..35 shadow damage to that foe and all adjacent allies of that foe.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Target foe receives 20% less from healing. If this foe dies while suffering from this hex, a level 1..17 masterless bone horror is summoned.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target foe receives 20% less benefit from healing. If target foe dies while hexed with Malign Intervention, a level 1..17 masterless bone horror is summoned.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..15 seconds.) Steal 15..45 Health whenever target foe hits with an attack.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..15 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you steal up to 15..45 Health from that foe.

cd: Hex Spell. (10..40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. <c=@SkillDull>Interruption cost: you lose 10..5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 10..40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted, and you lose 10..5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (5..35 seconds.) Causes -2..4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 15..75 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.</c>
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 5..35 seconds, target foe suffers -2..4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 15..75 damage and Wither ends.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (6..12 seconds). Causes -3..8 Health degeneration. You have +3..8 Health regeneration.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 6..12 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer -3..8 Health degeneration, which you gain as Health regeneration.

cd: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 10..92 Health. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally of that foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 10..92 Health from that foe.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Steal 16..80 Health whenever target foe casts a spell.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, you steal up to 16..80 Health from that foe.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..35 seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. <c=@SkillDull>Only skills with the word "heal" in the description are affected.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 5..35 seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (30..60 seconds.) When using a skill on a foe, deal 5..20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 30..60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets a foe, you deal 5..20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

cd: Signet. Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding (3..15 seconds).
d: Signet. You inflict Bleeding for 3..15 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.

cd: Elite Signet. Transfers all conditions with 100..200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. <c=@SkillDull>50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.</c>
d: Elite Signet. Transfer all negative conditions with 100..200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)

cd: Spell. Deals 10..48 damage.
d: Spell. Deal 10..48 shadow damage to target foe.

cd: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). 3..16 more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that party member does +3..16 damage.

cd: Hex Spell. (3..16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0..3 Health degeneration.
d: Hex Spell. For the next 3..16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0..3 Health degeneration.

cd: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5..30 seconds). They attack 50% slower.
d: Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next 5..30 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. (8..20 seconds.) Target foe cannot block.
d: Hex Spell. For 8..20 seconds, target foe cannot block.

d: Enchantment Spell. For the next 30..60 seconds, whenever you receive damage, your closest minion suffers 75% of that damage for you.

d: Enchantment Spell. For the next 15..60 seconds, whenever you receive a condition, that condition is transferred to your closest minion instead.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..35 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 5..50 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. <c=@SkillDull>You have -1 Health degeneration. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 5..35 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Energy degeneration and you suffer -1 Health degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 5..50 damage and Malaise ends.

cd: Spell. Removes 5..9 enchantments from target foe. <c=@SkillDull>Removal cost: you lose 55..25 Health for each Monk enchantment removed.</c>
d: Spell. Remove 5..9 enchantments from target foe. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 55..25 Health.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (6..30 seconds.) Target and nearby foes have -0..3 Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 6..30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0..3 Health degeneration, and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

cd: Spell. Removes 0..2 enchantments from target foe. Removal effect: you steal 5..65 Health.
d: Spell. Remove 0..2 enchantments from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal 5..65 Health.

d: Spell. You become Poisoned for 10 seconds. Foes in the area of your target are struck for 10..44 cold damage and lose 1..2 enchantments.

cd: Signet. Deals 10..70 damage to foes near you. <c=@SkillDull>You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).</c>
d: Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take 10..70 damage.

cd: Elite Spell. You gain 8..20 Energy.
d: Elite Spell. You gain 8..20 Energy.

d: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever any party member hits with an attack, that party member gains one hit of adrenaline. (50% failure chance with Blood Magic of 4 or less.)

d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage, that party member steals up to 3..16 Health.

cd: Spell. Transfer 1..3 conditions and their remaining durations from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.
d: Spell. Transfer 1..3 negative conditions and their remaining durations from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

cd: Spell. Steals 100..400 Health from allied undead servant.
d: Spell. Steal up to 100..400 Health from target animated undead ally.

cd: Spell. Steals 18..60 Health.
d: Spell. Steal up to 18..60 Health from target foe.

d: Touch Skill. Transfer 1..3 negative conditions and their remaining durations from yourself to target touched foe.

d: Touch Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29..74 Health.

d: Enchantment Spell. For 8..14 seconds, target touched ally gains +3 Energy regeneration. Blood Ritual cannot be used on the caster.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 20..58 damage.

d: Spell. Target foe and foes adjacent to your target have Cracked Armor for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..13 seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..13 seconds, target ally moves 33% faster.

d: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0..1 Energy and are healed for 200..500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

cd: Spell. Deals 30..135 fire damage to foes adjacent to you.

cd: Spell. Deals 15..120 fire damage to all foes near you.
d: Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 15..120 fire damage.

cd: Spell. Deals 15..120 fire damage. Also affects foes near your target. Inflicts Burning condition (1..3 seconds).
d: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15..120 fire damage and set on fire for 1..3 seconds.

cd: Spell. Deals 20..75 fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1..3 seconds).

d: Glyph. For the next 15 seconds, your next 2 spells cost 10..18 less Energy to cast.

d: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and ignores the effects of being Dazed.

cd: Elite Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell recharges instantly.
d: Elite Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell instantly recharges.

Hex Spell. Deals 10..70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. For 5..20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to activate signets. If you are Overcast, foes struck with Rust have their signets interrupted and disabled for 1..10 seconds.

d: Enchantment Spell. For 36..60 seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.

d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8..20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

cd: Spell. Deals 22..112 damage.

d: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a lightning weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5..20 lightning damage.

d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 25..50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5..20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

cd: Shout. (20 seconds.) You gain 100% more adrenaline.
d: Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.

cd: Stance. (5 seconds). You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>You do 25% less damage.</c>
d: Stance. For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33%, but you deal 25% less damage.

d: Stance. For 1..5 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0..4).

cd: Stance. (8 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>You take double damage.</c>
d: Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

cd: Skill. (7..18 seconds.) You have +90..300 maximum Health.
d: Skill. For 7..18 seconds you have an additional 90..300 Health.

cd: Stance. (8..14 seconds.) You move 25% faster.
d: Stance. For 8..14 seconds, you move 25% faster.

d: Hammer Attack. If this attack strikes a foe who is knocked down, the resulting dust cloud will blind adjacent foes for 3..7 seconds.

cd: Hammer Attack. Deals +10..40 damage.
d: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10..40 damage.

cd: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes for +1..20 damage.

cd: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

d: Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Skill. (5..11 seconds.) Your melee attacks are unblockable.
d: Skill. For 5..11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.

d: Elite Hex Spell. For 3..15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health that foe loses 25..100 Health.

cd: Spell. Deals 12..48 damage. Steals 12..48 Health if target foe's Health is above 50%.
d: Spell. Target foe takes 12..48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12..48 Health.

cd: Spell. Deals 15..60 cold damage. Recharges instantly if target foe had more Health than you.
d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15..60 cold damage. If that foe had more Health than you, Bitter Chill recharges instantly.

cd: Spell. Heals you for 30..150. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target foe is below 50% Health.</c>
d: Spell. If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 30..150 Health.

cd: Spell. Deals 6..60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4..20 more damage for each enchantment on them.
d: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6..60 shadow damage and 4..20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

cd: Hex Spell. (10..40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. <c=@SkillDull>Interruption cost: you lose 10..5 Energy or this hex ends.</c>
d: Hex Spell. For 10..40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted and you lose 10..5 Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.

d: Touch Skill. Summon a level-25 celestial horror at your location. Each time the celestial horror successfully lands an attack, your party gains 25 Health and 3 Energy.

cd: Spell. Steals 15..60 Health. Hits 2 additional foes in the area.
d: Spell. Vampiric Swarm steals up to 15..60 Health from up to three foes in the area.

cd: Spell. Steals 20..65 Health. <c=@SkillDull>You begin Bleeding (10 seconds) if your Health is above 50%.</c>
d: Spell. If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to 20..65 Health from target foe.

cd: Touch Skill. Steals 29..74 Health.</c>
d: Touch Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29..74 Health.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 20..58 damage.
d: Touch Skill. Target touched foe takes 20..58 damage.

cd: Touch Skill. Causes 5..50 Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition (5..20 seconds).
d: Touch Skill. Target touched foe loses 5..50 Health and suffers from Weakness for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Spell. Deals 10..40 cold damage. Burning foes take +40..80 damage and are interrupted. Also strikes adjacent.
d: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 10..40 cold damage. Burning foes struck by Teinai's Wind take an additional 40..80 damage and are interrupted.

Spell. Send out a Shock Arrow that flies swiftly toward target foe, striking for 5..50 lightning damage. If Shock Arrow strikes a foe suffering from Cracked Armor, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage. Shock Arrow has 25% armor penetr

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 10..40 earth damage each second (5 seconds) and causes knock-down to attacking foes. Hits foes near target's initial location.
d: Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take 10..40 earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..11 seconds.) You have 25..50% chance to block. Deals 5..35 earth damage to one nearby foe whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..11 seconds, you have 25..50% chance to block attacks and whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack one nearby foe is struck for 5..35 earth damage.

cd: Hex Spell. Deals 35..65 earth damage. Burning foes are hexed for 5 seconds and miss 20..75% of attacks. Also strikes adjacent.
d: Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 35..65 earth damage. Burning foes struck by Ash Blast are hexed for 5 seconds and have a 20..75% chance to miss with attacks.

cd: Spell. Deals 26..100 earth damage. Causes knock-down. Also hits foes near this foe.
d: Spell. You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26..100 earth damage.

cd: Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Overcast. You lose all enchantments.
d: Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Energy restricted by Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

cd: Hex Spell. Deals 10..70 fire damage to target. If you are Overcast, foe is hexed for 3 seconds, taking 5..25 fire damage each second.
d: Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10..70 fire damage. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Smoldering Embers for 3 seconds and takes 5..25 additional fire damage each second.

Elite Enchantment Spell. Invoke the power of the Dragon. For 8 seconds, you and target ally are enchanted with Double Dragon. Adjacent foes are dealt 5..30 fire damage each second. Additionally, when you or your ally use skills that target a foe, that foe is set on fire for 0..3 seco

cd: Ward Spell. (10..15 seconds.) Causes -2..5 health degeneration. Weakened foes in the ward attack 33% slower. Disabled for 20 seconds.
d: Ward Spell. Place a ward of Teinai's Heat at your location for 10..15 seconds. Foes within the ward suffer 2..5 health degeneration. Weakened foes attack 33% slower. This skill is disabled for 20 seconds.

cd: Spell. Deals 10..40 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.
d: Spell. Create Breath of Fire at target foe's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 10..40 fire damage each second.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 7..112 fire damage. Inflicts Burning (1..4 seconds). Gain 2 Energy for each foe struck. Also hits foes in the area.
d: Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for 7..112 fire damage and set on fire for 1..4 seconds. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.

cd: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly. <c=@SkillDull>You lose all Energy.</c>
d: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly but causes you to lose all Energy.

cd: Hex Spell. (1..6 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower. Foes with Cracked Armor have 5..9 Health degeneration.
d: Hex Spell. For 1..6 seconds, target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower. If that foe has Cracked Armor, the chill seeps through causing 5..9 Health degeneration.

d: Elite Hex Spell. Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take 15..70 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2..6 seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic, Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.

cd: Spell. Deals 20..40 damage to target. Deals +20..40 more damage and causes Cracked Armor (5..15 seconds) nearby if that foe had a Water Magic hex.
d: Spell. Target foe takes 20..40 damage. If target foe has a Water Magic hex, this spell strikes target and nearby foes for an additional 20..40 damage, and nearby foes also suffer Cracked Armor for 5..15 seconds.

d: Touch Skill. Create a celestial storm at target foe's location that lasts for 15 seconds. Each second, all foes in the area take 40 fire damage, 40 cold damage, 40 lightning damage, and 40 earth damage.

cd: Spell. Deals 8..32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.
d: Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8..32 holy damage each second.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30..90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. <c=@SkillDull>Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells, that ally is healed for 30..90 Health.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (4..10 seconds.) Enchantments cast on target ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy). <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 4..10 seconds, enchantments cast on target other ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy).

cd: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15..60.
d: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15..60 points.

cd: Elite Spell. Heals for 10..160. Party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus. <c=@SkillDull>Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).</c>
d: Elite Spell. Target ally is healed for 10..160. All party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus from this spell. Your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

cd: Spell. Heals you for 30..180. Also heals adjacent creatures.

cd: Spell. Heals for 35..180. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>

cd: Axe Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. 20% armor penetration.

d: Preparation. For 20 seconds, whenever your attacks hit a foe, all nearby foes take 50 damage for each enchantment on your target.

d: Stance. For 20 seconds, if Kuunavang is in casting range when this creature dies, Kuunavang is healed for 500 Health.

d: Spell. Create 6 "Corrupted Scale" creatures around target foe. Foes within their range attack 50% slower and suffer from -10 Health degeneration. Corrupted Scale creatures die after 30 seconds.

d: Touch Skill. Enemies within the blast area take 80 damage. Target foe takes 250 damage.

d: Spell. Only those of royal blood can pass through the defenses of the emperor's palace.

d: Spell. The magical protections sealing Tahnnakai Temple temporarily lift, allowing passage into the Temple's interior.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +10..40 damage.

cd: Shout. (5..20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 25% faster and you gain 1..31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.
d: Shout. For 5..20 seconds, your animal companion attacks 25% faster and heals you for 1..31 Health with each successful attack.

cd: Stance. (5..11 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 27..75% chance to block projectiles. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you attack.</c>
d: Stance. For 5..11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27..75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Zojun's Haste ends if you attack.

cd: Bow Attack. Fast-moving arrow. Deals 10..30 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is below 50% Health. <c=@SkillDull>Your other attack skills are disabled (2 seconds).</c>
d: Bow Attack. Needling Shot strikes for only 10..30 damage and moves faster than normal. If Needling Shot strikes a foe below 50% Health, Needling Shot recharges instantly. Your other attack skills are disabled for 2 seconds.

cd: Elite Bow Attack. Slow-moving arrow. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed condition (5..20 seconds).
d: Elite Bow Attack. You shoot a broad head arrow that moves slower than normal. If it hits, target foe is Dazed for 5..20 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell that spell is interrupted.

cd: Elite Preparation. (10..35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5..20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10..20 seconds).
d: Elite Preparation. For 10..35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5..20 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10..20 seconds if they are Blocked.

cd: Elite Signet. (1..24 seconds.) Conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.
d: Elite Signet. For 1..24 seconds, conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.

cd: Pet Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.
d: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Savage Pounce that deals +5..20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.

cd: Elite Pet Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5..20 seconds) and deals +10..50 damage.
d: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5..20 seconds and deals +10..50 damage.

cd: Pet Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4..10 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.
d: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals +5..20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4..10 seconds.

cd: Pet Attack. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5..20 seconds).
d: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Poisonous Bite that Poisons target foe for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Pet Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.
d: Pet Attack. Your animal companion's next attack is a Pounce that deals +5..20 damage. If the attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.

cd: Touch Skill. (15 seconds.) Affects all party members. 75% chance to block. +3 Health regeneration.
d: Touch Skill. For 15 seconds, your entire party has a 75% chance to block attacks and +3 Health regeneration.

cd: Stance. (5..11 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. <c=@SkillDull>Your non-attack skills are disabled (5 seconds).</c>
d: Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5..11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

cd: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5..35 piercing damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5..20 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Easily interrupted.</c>
d: Trap. Create a Viper's Nest. When it is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5..35 piercing damage and become Poisoned for 5..20 seconds. Viper's Nest expires after 90 seconds. This Trap is easily interrupted.

cd: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (30..150 second lifespan). Overcast-causing spells cast within range cause an additional 10 Overcast.
d: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. Spells cast within its range that cause Overcast cause an additional 10 Overcast. This spirit dies after 30..150 seconds.

cd: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (15..60 second lifespan). Enchantments expire 20..50% faster on creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.
d: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. Enchantments cast by non-spirit creatures within its range expire 20..50% faster. This spirit dies after 15..60 seconds.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 10..65 lightning damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 10 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 10..65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.

cd: Elite Skill. (5..35 seconds.) You have +2..4 to all Ritualist attributes for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10..60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.
d: Elite Skill. For 5..35 seconds, your Ritualist attributes are boosted by 2..4 for your next skill.  If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10..60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.

cd: Item Spell. (15..60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15..85 lightning damage to all nearby foes.
d: Item Spell. Hold Daoshen's ashes for up to 15..60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15..85 lightning damage.

cd: Item Spell. (15..60 seconds.) You have +10 armor. Drop effect: all party members are healed for 10..85.
d: Item Spell. Hold Kaolai's ashes for up to 15..60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain 10 armor. When you drop his ashes, all party members are healed for 10..85 Health.

cd: Elite Item Spell. (45 seconds.) Your spells and binding rituals cost -5..50% of the base Energy.
d: Elite Item Spell. Hold Songkai's ashes for up to 45 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your spells and binding rituals cost -5..50% of the base Energy to cast.

cd: Item Spell. (5..20 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each hex or condition on you. Drop effect: you lose 1..4 conditions.
d: Item Spell. Hold Xiko's ashes for up to 5..20 seconds. For each hex or condition you are suffering from while holding her ashes, you gain +3 Health regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you lose 1..4 conditions.

cd: Item Spell. (45 seconds.) Drop effect: resurrects party members in the area (15..75% Health and zero Energy).

cd: Item Spell. (10..60 seconds.) Your Ritualist hexes cost 1..5 less energy and last 33% longer. Drop effect: all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.
d: Item Spell. Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10..60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1..5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.

d: Spell. Teleport target allied spirit to your location.

d: Elite Skill. For 3 seconds, all damage you take is reduced by 75%. When Ether Prism ends, you gain 5..20 Energy.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (1..61 seconds). Your elemental attributes are set to 8..14 and elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 1..61 seconds, all of your elemental attributes are set to 8..14, and your elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.

cd: Spell. Deals 5..50 fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.
d: Spell. Target foe takes 5..50 fire damage. If that foe is on Fire, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 5..20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.
d: Elite Spell. You create Savannah Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take 5..20 fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (8..14 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals 15..120 fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.
d: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 15..120 fire damage. For 8..14 seconds, you move 25% faster. Flame Djinn's Haste recharges 50% faster if a foe was struck by this spell.

cd: Hex Spell. Deals 20..80 cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower (1..5 seconds).
d: Hex Spell. If target foe is under the effect of a Water Magic hex, that foe is struck for 20..80 cold damage. Otherwise, that foe moves 66% slower for 1..5 seconds.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage. Negation effect: deals 30..180 holy damage to one foe near target ally.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and one nearby foe takes 30..180 holy damage.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..23 seconds.) Heals for 5..35 whenever target ally takes damage while knocked-down.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..23 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage while knocked down, that ally is healed for 5..35 Health.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target ally has +1..4 Health regeneration and gains 30..120 Health if this enchantment ends early.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally gains +1..4 Health regeneration. If this skill ends prematurely, that ally gains 30..120 Health.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10..55 seconds.) Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10..55 seconds. Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more Health.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. Your Healing Prayers spells cost 1..3 less Energy. <c=@SkillDull>These spells heal for 25% less.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your Healing Prayers spells heal for 25% less Health, but cost -1..3 Energy.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5..10 seconds.) Causes knock-down to the next foe attempting to knock-down target ally.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5..10 seconds, the next time target ally would be knocked down by a foe, that foe is knocked down instead.

cd: Spell. Heals for 15..60. Heals for 15..45 more if target ally has a condition.
d: Spell. Target ally is healed for 15..60 Health and an additional 15..45 Health if that ally is suffering from a condition.

cd: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5..70.
d: Elite Spell. All party members are healed for 5..70 Health.

cd: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15..75 damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.
d: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, each time target foe is the target of an enchantment, the caster of that enchantment takes 15..75 damage.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (3..7 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage by 5 each time target ally takes damage.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 3..7 seconds, damage received by target ally is reduced by 5 each time that ally is hit while under the effects of this enchantment.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum 5..75).
d: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, the foe dealing the damage takes that damage instead (maximum 5..75).

cd: Spell. Removes two conditions. Heals for 15..60 for each condition removed.
d: Spell. Touched ally loses two conditions and is healed for 15..60 Health for each condition removed in this way.

cd: Axe Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.
d: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you inflict +5..20 damage. If this attack results in a critical hit, target foe is interrupted.

cd: Axe Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.
d: Axe Attack. When this attack hits, you deal +5..20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Deep Wound, you interrupt that foe's action.

cd: Stance. (1..15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>You move 33% slower.</c>
d: Stance. For 1..15 seconds, you attack 33% faster but move 33% slower.

cd: Elite Stance. (1..10 seconds.) You move 33% faster and deal +10..40 damage with your next melee hit. <c=@SkillDull>Ends when you hit or if you use a skill.</c>
d: Elite Stance. For 1..10 seconds, you run 33% faster. Your next successful melee hit does +10..40 damage and this stance ends. This stance ends if you use a skill.

cd: Elite Touch Skill. Deals 40..100 damage. <c=@SkillDull>You are Dazed (5..20 seconds).</c>
d: Elite Touch Skill. Target touched foe takes 40..100 damage. You are Dazed for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. You are healed for 50..110 and gain 0..3 strikes of adrenaline. <c=@SkillDull>Disables your signets (12 seconds).</c>
d: Touch Skill. All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50..110 Health, and you gain 0..3 strikes of adrenaline.

cd: Elite Skill. You gain 1..7 adrenaline. <c=@SkillDull>For 10 seconds, adrenal skills have a 5 second recharge when used.</c>
d: Elite Skill. Gain 1..7 strikes of adrenaline. For 10 seconds, whenever you use an adrenal skill, that skill recharges for 5 seconds.

cd: Hammer Attack. Deals +5..20 damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
d: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5..20 damage and gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

cd: Hammer Attack. Deals +1..20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, they are Dazed (1..8 seconds).
d: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1..20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1..8 seconds.

cd: Signet. You have +50..300 maximum Health. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you hit with an attack.</c>
d: Signet. You have +50..300 maximum Health. This signet ends if you successfully hit with an attack.

cd: Elite Shout. Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>No effect if target foe is near one of its allies.</c>
d: Elite Shout. If target foe isn't near an ally, that foe suffers from Cripple and Weakness for 8 seconds.

cd: Stance. (2..10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>End effect: lose all adrenaline.</c>
d: Stance. For 2..10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. When this stance ends, you lose all adrenaline.

cd: Stance. (5..15 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain +0..3 adrenaline on your next melee attack. <c=@SkillDull>Ends after your next hit.</c>
d: Stance. For 5..15 seconds, you move 25% faster. Enraging Charge ends when you successfully strike a target, at which point you gain 0..3 strikes of adrenaline if you hit with a melee attack.

cd: Elite Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5..15 seconds) and Bleeding condition (10..25 seconds).
d: Elite Sword Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Crippled for 5..15 seconds and begins Bleeding for 10..25 seconds.

cd: Sword Attack. Deals +5..30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5..15 seconds) if you are not in a stance.
d: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5..30 damage. If you are currently not in a stance, you also inflict Bleeding for 5..15 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. The purified waters of the vial affect one target (10 seconds). Harbingers become vulnerable to damage from all sources.
d: Hex Spell. The purified waters of the vial affect one target for 10 seconds. Harbingers become vulnerable to damage from all sources.

cd: Touch Skill. You disable an activated sentry trap before it discharges. <c=@SkillDull>You are easily interrupted.</c>
d: Touch Skill. You disable an activated sentry trap before it discharges. You are easily interrupted while using this skill.

cd: Melee Attack. Toma instantly kills any enemy that is at 20% Health. This lowers Toma's hunger level meter.
d: Melee Attack. Toma instantly kills any enemy that is at 20% Health. This lowers Toma's hunger level meter.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals 100 damage and knocks-down players in the area (4 seconds). If a player is carrying a bundle item, that bundle item is destroyed. This skill cannot be disabled.
d: Melee Attack. Players in the area are knocked down for 4 seconds and take 100 damage. If a player is carrying a bundle item, that bundle item is destroyed. This skill cannot be disabled.

cd: Skill. Creature is invulnerable to all damage except from the Light of Seborhin. Is not seen by players.
d: Skill. Creature is invulnerable to all damage except from the Light of Seborhin. Is not seen by players.

cd: Touch Skill. Ancient energies are called forth to create the Light of Seborhin. This skill cannot be disabled.
d: Touch Skill. Ancient energies are called forth to create the Light of Seborhin. This skill cannot be disabled.

cd: Touch Skill. A skill used by Zhed Shadowpaw that opens up the holding cells, Zhed will use this skill anytime he is in range of a holding cell and not within agro radius of an enemy. When Zhed completes this skill it consumes one cell key.
d: Touch Skill. A skill used by Zhed Shadowpaw that opens up the holding cells, Zhed will use this skill anytime he is in range of a holding cell and not within agro radius of an enemy.  When Zhed completes this skill it consumes one cell key.

cd: Spell. Attempting to shut off the pump
d: Spell. Attempting to shut off the pump

cd: Skill. (monster only)
d: Skill. (monster only)

cd: Skill. Creature is invulnerable unless affected by a Vial of Purified Water. Is not seen by players.
d: Skill. Creature is invulnerable unless affected by a Vial of Purified Water. Is not seen by players.

cd: Skill. Creature takes half damage from magical sources. Is not seen by players.
d: Skill. Creature takes half damage from magical sources. Is not seen by players.

cd: Skill. Creature takes half damage from physical sources. Is not seen by players.
d: Skill. Creature takes half damage from physical sources. Is not seen by players.

cd: Skill. Creature takes half damage from all sources. Is not seen by players.
d: Skill. Creature takes half damage from all sources. Is not seen by players.

cd: Spell. Deals 150 damage to all foes in the area.
d: Spell. All enemies in the area are hit for 150 damage.

cd: Skill. This creature resurrects every 30 seconds if any other enchanted guardians are still alive in the room. This creature recharges skills 90% faster and cannot be interrupted or knocked-down.
d: Skill. This creature resurrects every 30 seconds if any other enchanted guardians are still alive in the room. This creature has 90% faster recharge on skills and cannot be interrupted or knocked down.

cd: Skill. (monster only)
d: Skill. (monster only)

cd: Hex Spell. Quarter speed projectile: target and foes in the area move slower (10 seconds).
d: Hex Spell. Throw a net at target foe. On impact, all foes in the area move slower for 10 seconds. The net projectile flies at a quarter of the normal speed.

cd: Spell. Heal one corrupted root for 300. Caster is also fully healed.
d: Spell. Heal one corrupted root for 300 Health. Caster is also fully healed.

cd: Skill. When this creature dies, all corrupted flowers in the area also die.
d: Skill. When this creature dies, all corrupted flowers in the area also die.

cd: Stance. (10 seconds.) All corrupted plants in the area are invulnerable to physical and elemental damage.
d: Stance. For 10 seconds, all corrupted plants in the area do not take physical and elemental damage.

cd: Skill. You have been swallowed by a great wurm. You can command the wurm to move and use its skills.
d: Skill. You have been swallowed by a great wurm. You can command the wurm to move and use its skills.
