d: Touch Skill. Exploit one adjacent corpse. Junundu Feast is replaced with Choking Breath, Blinding Breath or Burning Breath for 30 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 150 piercing damage. You are healed for 75.
d: Touch Skill. Target touched foe is struck for 150 piercing damage. You gain 75 Health.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 250 damage and causes knock-down (4 seconds). Also affects adjacent foes.
d: Touch Skill. All adjacent foes are struck for 250 damage and knocked down for 4 seconds.

cd: Elite Touch Skill. Projectile: deals 400 earth damage and causes knock-down. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot be used on nearby foes.</c>
d: Elite Touch Skill. Spit a projectile at target foe. It strikes for 400 earth damage and knocks down target foe if it hits. This skill cannot be used on nearby foes.

cd: Stance. (10 seconds.) You move 66% faster. End effect: knocks-down adjacent foes (3 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you use a skill.</c>
d: Stance. For 10 seconds, you move 66% faster. This skill ends if you use a skill. When this skill ends, all adjacent foes are knocked down for 3 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. The junundu releases you from its jaws.
d: Touch Skill. The junundu releases you from its jaws.

cd: Spell. Any nearby rifts or altars become much more Tormented.
d: Spell. Any nearby rifts or altars become much more Tormented

cd: Touch Skill. The caster fires a signal flare high into the air to attract attention. This skill is difficult to interrupt.
d: Touch Skill. The caster fires a signal flare high into the air to attract attention. This skill is difficult to interrupt.

cd: Touch Skill. You don't feel any stronger...
d: Touch Skill. You don't feel any stronger...

cd: Touch Skill. Causes knock-down (3 seconds). Inflicts Deep Wound condition (10 seconds).
d: Touch Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down for 3 seconds and suffers from a Deep Wound for 10 seconds.

cd: Skill. (12 seconds.) After the Blasphemy dies, its foes move 25% faster and take 50 damage when they are the target of a skill or attack.
d: Skill. For 12 seconds after the Blasphemy dies, the Blasphemy's foes move 25% faster and take 50 damage when they are the target of a skill or attack.

cd: Hex Spell. (12 seconds.) After the Blasphemy dies, its foes move 25% faster and take 50 damage when they are the target of a skill or attack.
d: Hex Spell. For 12 seconds after the Blasphemy dies, the  Blasphemy's foes move 25% faster and take 50 damage when they are the target of a skill or attack.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (3 seconds.) Target ally gains 100 Health each second. End effect: you are healed for 300 if skill ends normally. This skill cannot be disabled. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. Target other ally gains 100 Health every second for 3 seconds. When this enchantment ends normally, you are healed for 300 Health. This skill cannot be disabled.

cd: Melee Attack. Steal 30 Health for each condition on target foe. This foe randomly gains two of the following conditions (15 seconds): Poisoned, Bleeding, Diseased, Deep Wound, Crippled, Weakness, or Dazed. This skill cannot be disabled.
d: Melee Attack. Steal 30 Health from target foe for each condition on that foe. Target foe randomly gains two of the following conditions for 15 seconds: Poisoned, Bleeding, Diseased, Deep Wound, Crippled, Weakness, or Dazed. This skill cannot be disabled.

cd: Skill. Creature cannot take damage unless kneeling or hit with a siege weapon. Creature can be healed but does not gain out-of-combat regeneration.
d: Skill. Creature cannot take damage unless they are kneeling or hit with a siege weapon. Creature can be healed but does not gain out-of-combat regeneration.

cd: Skill. For each 100 damage the creature has taken in the last 4 seconds, that creature moves 20% slower (maximum 80%).
d: Skill. For each 100 damage the creature has taken in the last 4 seconds, that creature's movement speed is slowed by 20% (maximum 80%).

cd: Touch Skill. (5 seconds.) Creature kneels and takes double damage. End effect: a duplicate of the creature is summoned to this location.
d: Touch Skill. Creature kneels for 5 seconds and takes double damage. After 5 seconds, a duplicate of the creature is summoned to this location.

cd: Touch Skill. (5 seconds.) Creature kneels and takes double damage. End effect: 4 random torment creatures are summoned to this location.
d: Touch Skill. Creature kneels for 5 seconds and takes double damage. After 5 seconds, 4 random torment creatures are summoned to this location.

cd: Touch Skill. If target ally is enchanted with Abaddon's Chosen, all foes in the area lose 70 Health and this ally gains 70 Health.
d: Touch Skill. If target ally is enchanted with Abaddon's Chosen, all foes in the area lose 70 Health and target ally gains 70 Health.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target cannot lose Health.
d: Enchantment Spell. Target cannot lose Health for 10 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. Target foe loses all enchantments each time this foe loses an enchantment.
d: Hex Spell. Each time target foe loses an enchantment, that foe loses all enchantments.

cd: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Target loses 20 Health each second. Ends sooner if target is at less than 20% Health.
d: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds or until target is at less than 20% Health, target foe loses 20 Health each second.

cd: Shout. (10 seconds.) All of Varesh's allies gain target enemy as a priority target.
d: Shout. For 10 seconds, all of Varesh's allies gain target enemy as a priority target.

cd: Melee Attack. (30 seconds.) Deals 15 earth damage every second to all foes in the area. Any foe using a skill when struck is knocked-down.
d: Melee Attack. For 30 seconds, all foes in this area are struck for 15 earth damage every second. Any foe using a skill when struck is knocked down.

cd: Melee Attack. (30 seconds.) Deals 50 cold damage every 3 seconds to all foes in the area. Any foe moving when struck moves 90% slower (10 seconds).
d: Melee Attack. For 30 seconds, all foes in the area are struck for 50 cold damage every 3 seconds. Any foe moving when struck is slowed by 90% for 10 seconds.

cd: Skill. (15 seconds.) The Drought draws Energy from the flowing waters that surround it and has +5 Health regeneration.
d: Skill. The Drought draws Energy from the flowing waters that surround it to gain +5 Health regeneration for 15 seconds.

cd: Skill. (15 seconds.) The Drought draws Energy from the flowing waters that surround it and has +1..4 Health regeneration.
d: Skill. The Drought draws Energy from the flowing waters that surround it to gain +1..4 Health regeneration for 15 seconds.

cd: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10..25 damage. You gain 1..9 Energy if you have a preparation active.
d: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10..25 damage. If you are under the effects of a preparation, you gain 1..9 Energy.

cd: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10..30 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1..7 seconds).
d: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10..30 damage and cause Burning for 1..7 seconds.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +10..25 damage. Unblockable. <c=@SkillDull>This arrow moves 50% slower.</c>
d: Bow Attack. If this arrow hits, it strikes for +10..25 damage. This arrow cannot be blocked, but it moves 50% slower.

cd: Elite Shout. Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and inflicts Bleeding (5..15 seconds) with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, you inflict Crippled condition (5..15 seconds).
d: Elite Shout. Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and causes Bleeding for 5..15 seconds with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, target foe is Crippled for 5..15 seconds.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is near any of your allies.
d: Bow Attack. If this attack hits target foe, it deals +5..20 damage. If that foe is near any of your allies, this attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3..15 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>You have -40 armor while activating this skill.</c>
d: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows cause Bleeding for 3..15 seconds. You have -40 armor while activating this skill.

cd: Elite Touch Skill. (10 seconds.) You gain 3..12 Energy if you strike a foe who has a condition.
d: Elite Touch Skill. For 10 seconds, if you strike a foe who is suffering from a condition you gain 3..12 Energy.

cd: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (30..90 second lifespan). Poisoned or Diseased creatures in range have -2 Health degeneration.
d: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. Poisoned or Diseased creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. This spirit dies after 30..90 seconds.

cd: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (30..90 second lifespan). Creatures lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. Does not affect spirits.
d: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. All non-spirit creatures within its range lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. This spirit dies after 30..90 seconds.

cd: Stance. (10 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Renewal: whenever you take elemental damage.
d: Stance. For 10 seconds, you move 25% faster. This stance is refreshed whenever you take Elemental damage.

cd: Stance. (5..30 seconds.) Your traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you hit with an attack.</c>
d: Stance. For 5..30 seconds, your Traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. This stance ends if you successfully hit with an attack.

cd: Trap. (90 seconds.) Deals 5..20 piercing damage to nearby foes. Causes knock-down to Crippled foes. <c=@SkillDull>Easily interrupted.</c>
d: Trap. When Tripwire is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5..20 piercing damage. Any Crippled foes are knocked down. Tripwire ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

cd: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Deals 2..12 damage each second. End effect: You gain 1..8 Energy.
d: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe suffers 2..12 damage each second. When this hex ends, you gain 1..8 Energy.

cd: Elite Spell. You gain 8..17 Energy. You do not sacrifice Health if any spirits are within earshot.
d: Elite Spell. Gain 8..17 Energy. If any spirits are within earshot, you do not sacrifice Health.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you create a creature, all nearby allies gain 5..50 Health and lose one condition.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, all allies near that creature gain 5..50 Health and lose 1 condition.

cd: Signet. Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15..100% maximum Energy. <c=@SkillDull>For 120 seconds, you die the next time this party member dies.</c>
d: Signet. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15..100% maximum Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.

cd: Elite Spell. All of your Spirits die. If a Spirit dies in this way, you gain 5..20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged.
d: Elite Spell. All of your spirits die. You gain 5..20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged if a spirit died in this way.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals 10..60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.
d: Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack deals 10..60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +3..12 damage. Deals an additional +3..12 damage if you are enchanted.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +3..12 damage. If you are enchanted, this attack deals an additional +3..12 damage.

cd: Scythe Attack. Deals +1..10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: deals +1..10 more damage and strikes all adjacent foes.
d: Scythe Attack. If it hits, this attack deals +1..10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, you do an additional +1..10 damage and strike all adjacent foes.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +3..15 damage. Struck foes lose 1 condition. Removal Effect: All foes adjacent to those struck take 10..40 holy damage.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +3..15 damage. Each foe you hit loses 1 condition. For each foe who loses a condition, all foes adjacent to that target foe take 10..40 holy damage.

cd: Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10..50 Health. Removal effect: unblockable, attack twice, and gain 10..70 more Health.
d: Melee Attack. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10..50 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, and you gain an additional 10..70 Health.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +5..25 damage. You gain 30..80 Health for each foe you hit that has less Health than you.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5..25 damage. If target foe has less Health than you, you gain 30..80 Health.

cd: Scythe Attack. Deals +3..15 damage. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance, deals +3..15 additional damage.
d: Scythe Attack. Deal +3..15 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If you lose an enchantment in this way, Irresistible Sweep cannot be blocked, removes a stance, and deals +3..15 additional damage.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +10..20 damage. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal Effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10..30 damage.
d: Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack deals +10..20 damage and removes 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10..30 damage.

cd: Spell. Deals 10..60 cold damage to all nearby foes. Deals 10..60 more cold damage if you are enchanted.
d: Spell. Deals 10..60 cold damage to all nearby foes. If you are enchanted, this spell deals an additional 10..60 cold damage.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Remove all your enchantments. Removal effect: your attacks deal lightning damage. End effect: inflicts Weakened condition (4..10 seconds) on adjacent foes.
d: Enchantment Spell. Lose all Enchantments. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal lightning damage. When this Enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Weakened for 4..10 seconds.

cd: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal cold damage. Initial effect: hits nearby foes for 10..40 cold damage. End effect: transfers 1..2 conditions to all nearby foes.
d: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 10..40 cold damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal cold damage. When this enchantment ends, you transfer  1..2 conditions to all nearby foes.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Spells you cast cost one less Energy for each enchantment on you.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5..20 seconds, Spells you cast cost 1 less Energy for each Enchantment on you.

cd: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5..15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3..8 seconds) on nearby foes.
d: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5..15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3..8 seconds.

cd: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: inflicts Burning (1..3 seconds) on nearby foes. End Effect: gain 1..2 strikes of adrenaline if any foes are in earshot.
d: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are set on fire for 1..3 seconds. For 20 seconds afterward, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, you gain 1..2 strikes of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.

cd: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals  10..40 earth damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1..4 seconds) on nearby foes.

cd: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5..20 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target has less than 50% Health.</c>
d: Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe with less than 50% Health, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Spear Attack. Interrupts actions. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target has a condition.</c>
d: Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is interrupted.

cd: Spear Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Unblockable. Ends target's stance.<c=@SkillDull>Disables your non-spear attack skills for 3 seconds.</c>
d: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +5..20 damage, and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked. All of your non-spear attack skills are disabled for 3 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. Whoever holds the Scepter of Ether steals 200 Health from each foe in the area.
d: Touch Skill. Whoever holds the Scepter of Ether steals 200 Health from each foe in the area.

cd: Spell. The Margonite utters words in an ancient tongue, and the ground beneath him begins to shiver and crack.
d: Spell. The Margonite utters words in an ancient tongue, and the ground beneath him begins to shiver and crack.

cd: Spell. Infantryman Hareh compels the dead to rise and do his bidding.
d: Spell. Infantryman Hareh compels the dead to rise and do his bidding.

cd: Shout. All of the Junundu's foes within earshot are Dazed for 5 seconds. If any of these foes were activating a skill, that foe's skill is interrupted and disabled for 15 seconds.
d: Shout. All of the Junundu's foes within earshot are Dazed for 5 seconds. If any of these foes were activating a skill, that foe's skill is interrupted and disabled for 15 seconds.

cd: Stance. Gives you +20 armor and blinds nearby foes when you take damage.
d: Stance. Gives you +20 armor and blinds nearby foes when you take damage.

cd: Touch Skill. (30 seconds.) Junundu Feast is replaced with Choking Breath, Blinding Breath or Burning Breath. <c=@SkillDull>Must exploit an adjacent fresh corpse.</c>
d: Touch Skill. Exploit one adjacent corpse. Queen Heal is replaced with Choking Breath, Blinding Breath or Burning Breath for 30 seconds.

cd: Shout. All of the junundu's foes within earshot are Dazed (5 seconds). If any of these foes were activating a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled (15 seconds).
d: Shout. All of the junundu's foes within earshot are Dazed for 5 seconds. If any of these foes were activating a skill, that foe's skill is interrupted and disabled for 15 seconds.

cd: Stance. You gain +20 armor. Whenever you take damage, nearby foes are Blinded.
d: Stance. You gain +20 armor. Whenever you take damage, nearby foes are Blinded.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 80 piercing damage.
d: Touch Skill. Target touched foe is struck for 80 piercing damage.

cd: Touch Skill. Deals 80 damage and knocks-down foes adjacent to you (4 seconds).
d: Touch Skill. All adjacent foes are struck for 80 damage and knocked down for 4 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. Projectile: deals 100 earth damage and causes knock-down. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot be used on nearby foes.</c>
d: Touch Skill. Spit a projectile at target foe. It strikes for 100 earth damage and knocks down target foe if it hits. This skill cannot be used on nearby foes.

cd: Stance. (30 seconds.) You move 33% faster. End effect: knocks-down adjacent foes (2 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you use a skill.</c>
d: Stance. For 30 seconds, you move 33% faster. This skill ends if you use a skill. When this skill ends, all adjacent foes are knocked down for 2 seconds.

cd: Skill. Caster can only be harmed by wurm siege.
Skill. (monster only)
d: Skill. (monster only)

cd: Melee Attack. If target foe has a condition, this attack deals +10..30 damage and is a critical hit.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you deal +10..30 damage and this attack results in a critical hit.

cd: Elite Dual Attack. Deals 5..50 damage. Removes one enchantment. Unblockable. <c=@SkillDull>Must follow an off-hand attack.</c>
Elite Off-Hand Attack. Inflicts Dazed condition (1..5 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless you are enchanted.</c>
d: Elite Off-Hand Attack. If you are under the effects of an enchantment and this attack hits, target foe is Dazed 1..5 seconds.

cd: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5..20 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Must strike a hexed foe.</c>
d: Off-Hand Attack. Must strike a hexed foe. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5..20 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Lead Attack. Deals +10..30 damage. Unblockable if you are enchanted.
d: Lead Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes +10..30 damage. If you are under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10..35 seconds.) Your half-ranged spells cast 5..50% faster and recharge 5..50% faster.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 10..35 seconds, half-ranged spells cast 5..50% faster and recharge 5..50% faster.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next 1..10 attack skills each remove one condition.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next 1..10 attack skills you use remove one condition.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Your dagger attacks are unblockable. <c=@SkillDull>Ends the next time you fail to hit.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5..20 seconds, your dagger attacks cannot be blocked. This enchantment ends the next time you fail to hit.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (4..10 seconds.) You have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you hit with an attack or use a skill.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 4..10 seconds, you have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. This enchantment ends if you successfully hit with an attack or use a skill.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (1..10 seconds.) Causes 50% slower movement. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (1..15 seconds). <c=@SkillDull>Your non-Assassin skills are disabled (10 seconds).</c>
d: Elite Hex Spell. Your non-Assassin skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 1..10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When this hex ends that foe is crippled for 1..15 seconds.

cd: Elite Touch Skill. Removes all enchantments. <c=@SkillDull>Must follow a dual attack.</c>
d: Elite Touch Skill. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe loses all enchantments.

cd: Elite Touch Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. Causes knock-down if target foe is not using a skill. <c=@SkillDull>Disables your non-dagger attack skills (10 seconds).</c>
d: Elite Touch Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. If target foe is not using a skill, that foe is knocked down. All of your non-dagger attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. Removes one enchantment.<c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.</c>
d: Touch Skill. If target touched foe is knocked down, that foe loses one enchantment.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..35 seconds.) Inflict Deep Wound condition (5..20 seconds) and Shadow Step to target foe the next time damage would drop this foe's Health below 50%.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..35 seconds, the next time damage would drop target foe's Health below 50%, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5..20 seconds and Shadow Step to that foe. This spell has half the normal range.

cd: Signet. Deals 10..100 damage. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target foe is Poisoned.</c>
d: Signet. If target foe is suffering from Poison, that foe takes 10..100 damage.

cd: Signet. Removes one enchantment for each hex on target foe.
d: Signet. For each hex on target foe, that foe loses one enchantment.

cd: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) While wielding daggers, you attack 5..20% faster and have +5..35% chance to land a critical hit.
d: Elite Stance. For the next 20 seconds while wielding daggers, you attack 5..20% faster and have a +5..35% chance to land a critical hit.

cd: Stance. (15 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location. <c=@SkillDull>Disables your attack skills for 1 second. Disables your enchantments and stances for 10 seconds.</c>
d: Stance. Shadow Step to target foe. For 15 seconds, nothing happens. Your attack skills are disabled for 1 second, and your stances and enchantments are disabled for 10 seconds. When this stance ends, you return to your original location.

cd: Spell. Gain 40..130 Health if you have less Health than target ally. Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Spell. Shadow Step to target ally. If you have less Health than that ally, you gain 40..130 Health.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 66% slower (1..7 seconds).
d: Elite Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. For 1..7 seconds, that foe moves 66% slower.

cd: Spell. You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's locations.
d: Spell. You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's location.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target ally. End effect: return to your original location. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target other ally. When you stop maintaining this enchantment, you return to your original location.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Causes 1..7 Energy loss the next time target foe uses an elite skill.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, the next time target foe uses an elite skill, that foe loses 1..7 Energy.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5..20 seconds). Remove one enchantment from target and nearby foes. Enchantments expire 150..300% faster on those foes.
d: Elite Hex Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe and all nearby foes. For 5..20 seconds, enchantments expire 150..300% faster on those foes.

cd: Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15..60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.
d: Signet. If target foe is attacking, that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take 15..60 damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.

cd: Stance. (5..20 seconds.) Your next signet recharges 20..80% faster.
d: Stance. For 5..20 seconds, the next signet you activate recharges 20..80% faster.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 15..75 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (10..25 seconds) if target foe is hexed or enchanted.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 15..75 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, that foe becomes Poisoned for 10..25 seconds.

cd: Well Spell. (10..30 seconds.) Foes in this well cannot use shouts and chants and have -1..4 Health degeneration. <c=@SkillDull>Exploits a fresh corpse.</c>
d: Well Spell. Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Silence for 10..30 seconds. Foes within the well cannot use shouts or chants and suffer -1..4 Health degeneration.

cd: Spell. Projectile: deals 5..50 earth damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Weakened.
d: Spell. Send a projectile that strikes for 5..50 earth damage if it hits. If this spell hits a weakened foe, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 15..60 fire damage. You gain 1..8 Energy if you have more Energy than target foe.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 15..60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, you gain 1..8 Energy.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10..35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1..5 seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 10..35 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for 1..5 seconds.

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 10..90 lightning damage. Hits two foes near target. 25% armor penetration.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10..90 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..11 seconds.) 50% chance to block enchanted foes.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..11 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks from enchanted foes.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10..35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy whenever you use a signet.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10..35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy whenever you use a signet.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (1..60 seconds.) Your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you cast an enchantment.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 1..60 seconds, your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. This enchantment ends if you cast another enchantment.

cd: Elite Spell. Heals for 10..115.
d: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 10..115 Health.

cd: Elite Spell. Heals for 30..180. You gain 7 Energy if target ally was below 50% Health.
d: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 30..180 Health. If target was below 50% Health, you gain 7 Energy.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. (5..25 seconds.) You gain 2 Energy whenever target foe hits with an attack.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 5..25 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you gain 2 Energy.

cd: Signet. Deals 5..35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).
d: Signet. Target foe takes 5..35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).

cd: Elite Signet. Removes one hex and one condition. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless target ally is enchanted.</c>
d: Elite Signet. If target ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally loses one hex and one condition.

cd: Spell. Removes one condition. Heals for 15..75 if target ally is enchanted.
d: Spell. Remove one condition from target ally. If that ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally is healed for 15..75 Health.

cd: Elite Spell. Removes 1..3 hexes. For each hex removed, target ally loses one condition and gains 15..75 Health.
d: Elite Spell. Remove up to 1..3 hexes from target ally. For each hex removed in this way, that ally loses one condition and gains 15..75 Health.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +5..35 damage. You gain 2..6 Energy if target foe is attacking.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5..35 damage. If you hit an attacking foe, you gain 2..6 Energy.

cd: Elite Melee Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.
d: Elite Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5..20 damage. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +10..40 damage. Unblockable if you are under the effects of a chant or shout.
d: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10..40 more damage. If you are under the effects of a chant or shout, this attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +5..50 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5..20 seconds). Automatic critical hit. <c=@SkillDull>You lose all adrenaline and Energy.</c>
d: Elite Axe Attack. You lose all adrenaline and all Energy. If this attack hits, you deal +5..50 damage and cause a Deep Wound for 5..20 seconds. This attack always results in a critical hit.

cd: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.
d: Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Elite Stance. (5..15 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
d: Elite Stance. For 5..15 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

cd: Stance. (1..6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while under the effects of a shout or chant. Block effect: gain 1 adrenaline.
d: Stance. For 1..6 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks while under the effects of a shout or chant. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each blocked attack.

cd: Stance. (8 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. <c=@SkillDull>You take double damage.</c>
d: Stance. For 8 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, but take double damage.

cd: Elite Stance. (10 seconds.) The next time you would be knocked-down, you gain 1..3 adrenaline and 1..7 Energy instead.
d: Elite Stance. For 10 seconds, the next time you would be knocked down, you gain 1..3 strikes of adrenaline and 1..7 Energy instead.

cd: Sword Attack. Deals +1..31 damage. You gain 1..5 adrenaline if target foe is knocked-down.
d: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1..31 damage. If you hit a foe that is knocked down, you gain 1..5 adrenaline.

cd: Melee Attack. Deals 100 blunt damage and causes knock-down to foes in the area of target. 80 earth damage to surrounding foes.
d: Melee Attack. All foes in the area of target take 100 blunt damage and are knocked down. Surrounding foes take 80 earth damage.

cd: Touch Skill. All foes take 30 damage 5 times over the next 3 seconds. Each strike also removes one stance or enchantment from each foe.
d: Touch Skill. All foes take 30 damage 5 times over the next 3 seconds. Each strike also removes one stance or enchantment from each foe.

cd: Hex Spell. (15 seconds.) Foes within earshot each have a random skill disabled (30 seconds) and take 20 damage for each of their skills currently recharging. <c=@SkillDull>End effect: their skills are recharged.</c>
d: Hex Spell. All targets within earshot are hexed with Words of Madness for 15 seconds, and each has a random skill disabled for 30 seconds and takes 20 damage for each skill currently recharging. When Words of Madness ends, their skills are recharged.

cd: Touch Skill. Steal 1000 Health.
d: Touch Skill. Steal up to 1000 Health from target foe.

cd: Chant. (60 seconds.) All skale in earshot have +50 maximum Health.
d: Chant. All skale within earshot gain +50 maximum Health for 60 seconds.

cd: Hex Spell. Deals 25 damage and causes -1 Health degeneration (10 seconds).
d: Hex Spell. Deals 25 damage and inflicts -1 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.

cd: Touch Skill. The Apocrypha is preparing to change to another form! It cannot be harmed while in tablet form.
d: Touch Skill. The Apocrypha is preparing to change to another form! It cannot be harmed while in tablet form.
n: The Apocrypha is changing to another form!

cd: Form. (monster only)
d: Form. (monster only)

cd: Form. (monster only)
d: Form. (monster only)

cd: Form. (monster only)
d: Form. (monster only)

cd: Touch Skill. Graven Monolith reforms itself to release new powers.
d: Touch Skill. Graven Monolith reforms itself to release new powers.

cd: Skill. (monster only)
d: Skill. (monster only)

cd: Spell. The user fires an Istani siege engine.
d: Spell. The user fires an Istani siege engine.

cd: Touch Skill. Caster consumes a soul, ripping it from this world and sending it to Dhuum.
d: Touch Skill. Caster consumes a soul, ripping it from this world and sending it to Dhuum.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +10..25 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5..20 seconds) if target foe is within earshot.
d: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10..25 damage. If your target is within earshot, that foe begins Bleeding for 5..20 seconds.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. Deals +5..25 more damage if you land a critical hit.
d: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5..20 damage. If you land a critical hit, you deal an additional +5..25 damage.

cd: Elite Skill. (3..15 seconds.) You and your pet attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless your pet is alive.</c>
d: Elite Skill. For 3..15 seconds, both you and your animal companion attack 33% faster and run 25% faster.

cd: Bow Attack. You shoot two arrows simultaneously. <c=@SkillDull>Shoot only one arrow if you are enchanted or hexed.</c>
d: Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. If you are under the effects of an enchantment or hex, you shoot only one arrow.

cd: Preparation. (36 seconds.) Interrupts an action whenever your arrows critical.
d: Preparation. For 36 seconds, whenever your arrows critical, they also interrupt your target.

cd: Elite Stance. (1..20 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and you gain +2 to your Marksmanship attribute.
d: Elite Stance. For 1..20 seconds, you attack 33% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 2.

cd: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (30..60 second lifespan). Chants and shouts cost 1..5 more Energy for creatures in range.
d: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. Chants and shouts cost 1..5 more Energy. This spirit dies after 30..60 seconds.

cd: Elite Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: an interrupted spell is disabled for +10 seconds. Unblockable.
d: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for an additional 10 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.

cd: Stance. (1..8 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 50% chance to block. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you become hexed or enchanted.</c>
d: Stance. For 1..8 seconds, you run 33% faster and have a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. Natural Stride ends if you become hexed or enchanted.

cd: Stance. (5..11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>Ends if you use an attack skill.</c>
d: Stance. For 5..11 seconds, you attack 33% faster. This stance ends if you use an attack skill.

cd: Elite Trap. (90 seconds.) Inflicts Blinded and Dazed conditions (5..10 seconds) to nearby foes. <c=@SkillDull>Easily interrupted.</c>
d: Elite Trap. When Smoke Trap is triggered, nearby foes are Blinded and Dazed for 5..10 seconds. Smoke Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

cd: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1..10 spirit (30..60 second lifespan). Doubles adrenaline gain for creatures in range.
d: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1..10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range gain adrenaline twice as fast. This spirit dies after 30..60 seconds.

cd: Item Spell. (60 seconds.) Shouts and chants you use last 20..50% longer.
d: Item Spell. For 60 seconds, all shouts and chants you use last 20..50% longer.

cd: Elite Item Spell. (30..60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15..85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.
d: Elite Item Spell. Hold Glaive's ashes for up to 30..60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, all Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. When you drop her ashes, all foes in the area are struck for 15..85 lightning damage.

cd: Spell. Deals 5..50 lightning damage. Deals 10..40 more lightning damage if you are under a weapon spell.
d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5..50 lightning damage. If you are under the effects of a weapon spell, you deal an additional 10..40 lightning damage.

cd: Binding Ritual. Destroys a spirit. Creates a level 1..14 spirit (30..60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5..20 damage.
d: Binding Ritual. Destroy target spirit and create a level 1..14 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5..20 damage. This spirit dies after 30..60 seconds.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (15..60 seconds.) Your attacks deal +5..35 damage if you are under a weapon spell.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 15..60 seconds, your attacks deal 5..35 more damage while under the effects of a weapon spell.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10..30 seconds.) You gain 1..5 Energy whenever you cast a weapon spell.
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10..30 seconds, whenever you cast a weapon spell on an ally, you gain 1..5 Energy.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (8..20 seconds.) You are immune to Blindness.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 8..20 seconds, you cannot be Blinded.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Your weapon and item spells cost 5..35% less Energy. <c=@SkillDull>No effect unless holding an item.</c>
d: Enchantment Spell. For 5..20 seconds, while holding an item, any weapon and item spells you cast cost 5..35% less Energy.

cd: Enchantment Spell. (10..30 seconds.) Whenever you cast a weapon spell, the targeted ally loses one condition.
d: Enchantment Spell. For 10..30 seconds, whenever you cast a weapon spell on an ally, that ally loses 1 condition.

cd: Spell. Heals for 15..90. You gain 15..90 Health if you are within earshot of a spirit. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot self-target.</c>
d: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 15..90 Health. If you are within earshot of a spirit, you are also healed for 15..90 Health.

cd: Elite Signet. (5..20 seconds.) All spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal +5..10 damage.
d: Elite Signet. For 5..20 seconds, all spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal +5..10 damage.

cd: Signet. You lose 200..50 Health. Gain control of target enemy-controlled spirit. <c=@SkillDull>50% failure chance unless Spawning Power 5 or more.</c>
d: Signet. You lose 200..50 Health and take control of target enemy-controlled spirit. (50% failure chance with Spawning Power 4 or less.)

cd: Elite Spell. Deals 20..75 lightning damage. You gain 5 Energy and 5..50 Health if you are holding an item.
d: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 20..75 lightning damage. If you are holding an item, you gain 5 Energy and 5..50 Health.

cd: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1..11 spirit (15..45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5..20 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.
d: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1..11 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5..20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15..45 seconds.

cd: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1..14 spirit (15..60 second lifespan). Allies in range holding an item gain 15..45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.
d: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1..14 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15..45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15..60 seconds.

cd: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1..14 spirit (30..60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20..50% faster.
d: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1..14 spirit. Conditions on allies within range of this spirit expire 20..50% faster. This spirit dies after 30..60 seconds.

cd: Elite Weapon Spell. (5..20 seconds.) 5..50% more adrenaline gain and +1 Energy whenever target ally hits with an attack.
d: Elite Weapon Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target ally gains 5..50% more adrenaline and 1 Energy whenever that ally successfully hits with an attack.

cd: Elite Weapon Spell. (8 seconds.) The next time target ally takes damage from a foe, that damage is limited to 5% of target ally's max Health and that ally steals up to 20..80 Health from that foe.
d: Elite Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage from a foe that damage is limited to 5% of that ally's max Health and that ally steals up to 20..80 Health from that foe.

cd: Weapon Spell. (3..13 seconds.) Attacks interrupt an action. <c=@SkillDull>Does not interrupt attacking foes.</c>
d: Weapon Spell. For 3..13 seconds, if target ally attacks a foe who is not attacking, that foe is interrupted.

cd: Elite Weapon Spell. (8 seconds.) The next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, this ally steals 15..75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.
d: Elite Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15..75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.

cd: Scythe Attack. Deals +5..20 damage. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: struck foes lose an enchantment.
d: Scythe Attack. You deal +5..20 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was lost, you remove an enchantment from each foe you hit.

cd: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (3..15 seconds.) You attack, move, and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
d: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3..15 seconds, you attack, move, and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

Flash Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes suffer from Disease for 1..2 seconds. For 20 seconds, nothing happens. Disease duration is doubled if you are enchanted when you activate this skill. When this enchantment ends, all party members in earshot are cured of Disease.

cd: Melee Attack. Inflicts Poison, Disease, and Weakness conditions (0 seconds); you teleport to a random nearby location.
d: Melee Attack. Creature shifts form to attack.

cd: Melee Attack. Shift forms to attack.
d: Melee Attack. Creature shifts form to attack.

cd: Melee Attack. Shift forms to attack.
d: Melee Attack. Creature shifts form to attack.

d: Touch Skill. Powder keg explodes in target's hand, knocking down that target and dealing 50 damage.

cd: Signet. Deals 5..35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.
d: Signet. Target foe takes 5..35 damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).

cd: Spell. Steals 10..50 Health. You gain 3..12 Energy if you have a condition.
d: Spell. Steal 10..50 Health from target foe. If you are suffering from a condition, you gain 3..12 Energy.

d: Enchantment Spell. Target foe takes 15..75 damage. If you are Overcast, Magnetic Surge enchants all allies in earshot for 1..5 seconds to block the next attack against them.

d: Spell. If target or adjacent foes are Blind or moving, these foes are knocked down. There is a 50% chance of failure with Water Magic less than 5.

d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5..50 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a Water Magic hex, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.

cd: Spell. Deals 1..2 damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.
d: Spell. Target foe takes 1..2 damage for each point of Energy you have (maximum 130 damage).

cd: Melee Attack. Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

d: Touch Skill. Spit a projectile at target foe. It strikes for 150 earth damage and knocks down target foe if it hits. This skill cannot be used on nearby foes.

d: Stance. For 1..5 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block an attack this way, you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.

cd: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5..25 seconds). These foes move 50% slower.
d: Elite Hex Spell. For 5..25 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes move 50% slower.

cd: Hex Spell. (5..20 seconds.) Target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 20% slower.
d: Hex Spell. For 5..20 seconds, target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 20% slower.

cd: Signet. Deals 26..56 holy damage. You gain 1..10 Energy if target foe is attacking.

cd: Signet. Deals 15..75 damage. Deals 5..50 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.
d: Signet. Target foe takes 15..75 damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, foes adjacent to your target take 5..50 damage.

cd: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10..40 damage. You gain 1..5 strikes of adrenaline if it hits.
d: Elite Sword Attack. If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10..40 damage and gain 1..5 strikes of adrenaline.

cd: Spell. Deals 15..60 lightning damage. You gain 1..9 Energy if any spirits are within earshot.
d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15..60 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, you gain 1..9 Energy.

cd: Spell. Deals 5..50 lightning damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1..3 seconds) if you are within earshot of a spirit.
d: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5..50 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, Spirit Burn causes Burning for 1..3 seconds.

cd: Spell. Affects foes adjacent to target foe's initial location. Deals 25..135 lightning damage after 3 seconds.
d: Spell. Open a Spirit Rift at target foe's location. After 3 seconds, all adjacent foes are struck for 25..135 lightning damage.

cd: Spell. Heals for 20..115. Removes one condition for each spirit within earshot.
d: Spell. Target ally is healed for 20..115 Health. That ally loses one condition for all spirits within earshot.

cd: Elite Spell. You gain 8..17 Energy. You do not sacrifice Health if any spirits are within earshot.
d: Elite Spell. Gain 8..17 Energy. If any spirits are within earshot, you do not sacrifice Health.

cd: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1..8 spirit (10..35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5..20 damage and remove one enchantment.
d: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1..8 spirit. This spirit deals 5..20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10..35 seconds.

d: Spell. Destroy target minion. That minion is replaced with a level 12 Spirit of Pain. This Spirit deals 30 damage. This Spirit dies after 150 seconds.

d: Spell. Remove an enchantment from all nearby foes. If enchantments are removed, you steal 1..5 Energy from each foe who loses an enchantment.

d: Spell. Create a Purifying Flame at your location. For 5 seconds, this flame deals 10..40 damage to foes in the area. When Purifying Flame ends, foes in the area lose 1 enchantment, and allies in the area lose 1 hex.

cd: Spell. Removes 2..5 hexes and 2..5 conditions from target ally. For each hex removed, 1 foe near target ally loses an enchantment.
d: Spell. Removes 2..5 hexes and 2..5 conditions from target ally. For each hex removed, 1 foe near target ally loses an enchantment.

cd: Stance. Your next 1..5 attacks strike for +1..15 damage and deal holy damage. If these attacks are blocked or miss, your target loses 1 enchantment and you lose 1 hex.
d: Stance. Your next 1..5 attacks strike for +1..15 damage and deal holy damage. If these attacks are blocked or miss, your target loses 1 enchantment and you lose 1 hex.

d: Trap. Create a Spring of Purity at your location that lasts for 10 seconds. Every two seconds, Spring of Purity removes 1 hex from adjacent allies, and removes 1 enchantment from adjacent foes.

cd: Stance. Attack and move 25% faster (5..15 seconds). Your critical hits remove an enchantment from target foe.

cd: Bow Attack. Deals +50 damage to target foe. Inflicts Bleeding (25 seconds). 25% chance of dealing +900 damage; 100% chance on Marked target.
d: Bow Attack. Deals +50 piercing damage to target foe and inflicts Bleeding for 25 seconds. Has a 25% chance of dealing +900 damage; 100% chance if target foe is Marked.

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3..30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15..20 damage and sacrifice 15..20 health. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3..30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15..20 health and deal 15..20 more damage. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. Spells cast 15..20% faster and recharge 15..50% faster. Continuously gain Overcast while active. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast 15..20% faster and recharge 15..50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Melee Attack. Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13..30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13..30 Holy damage and knocks down attacking foes. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Stance. (3..20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by 1..15. You attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Stance. For 3..20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by 1..15 and you attack 33% faster. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Shout. (3..15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5..15 damage and gain +1..7 Health regeneration. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Shout. For 3..15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5..15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1..7 Health regeneration. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Touch Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5..20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1..5 and your attributes are increased by 1..5. Counts as a Lead Attack. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Touch Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5..20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1..5 and your attributes are increased by 1..5. This skill counts as a Lead Attack. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Weapon Spell. (3..20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain the effect of a random Weapon Spell. <c=@SkillDull>Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Weapon Spell. For 3..20 seconds, each non-spirit ally in earshot gains the effect of a random Weapon Spell. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3..10 seconds.) Gain +1..5 energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3..10 seconds, you have +1..5 energy regeneration. This skill reapplies itself every time you use a non-Dervish skill. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>

cd: Elite Echo. (3..15 seconds.) Target ally gains +1..3 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally. <c=@SkillDull>Cannot target spirits. PvE Skill</c>
d: Elite Echo. For 3..15 seconds, target non-spirit ally gains +1..3 to all attributes. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally. <c=@SkillDull>PvE Skill</c>
